entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 6:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
